summary: The spell is hidden in Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
-Adds a new spell in Riverwood , the spell is hidden in Faendal\'s house .
-The spell deals between 40 and 60 damage  , and it costs little magica 
-WARNING : if you see on top of the screen the text \'Too powerful for atomic blast\' that is because the spell has disarm in it
-The spell has : Atomic blast ( damage health with ) , 10 + Disarm (has a chance to disarm enemy) and Fire damage !
-There are no bugs  , but if you find signal me .
- the video , if you want to see the mod 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DZGTAoRN-Uw&feature=youtu.be
-I hope you enjoy the mod
author: mastara2012
